notes.text: Unbound actions can now also trigger side effects
You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
We have resolved an issue with the application breaking after discarding a draft
We’ve resolved an issue where the corrupt context of a previously visited object page resulted in an error message while subsequently loading the same object page
We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
When repeating action triggers for multiple rows that have received a 412 warning on action execution, we no longer trigger the action for rows that have executed their action successfully
We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons

We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
We now ensure that trigger actions are executed in separate changesets
We now ensure that the default SemanticDate operator works as expected
The DateTime data type now supports the UTC format
We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
You can now execute the PrepareAction property by pressing Enter on object page tables in apps using the flexible column layout
We've resolved an issue for applications using the flexible column layout, which was causing the Save or Cancel action to fail after refreshing the page
End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
We have resolved an issue with destroying a flexible column layout view when navigating back from it
We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
For columns with a text arrangement annotation, we no longer display ‘Description’ as an option in the ‘Columns’ tab of the personalization dialog of the table
We've resolved an issue with the OData request for the Delete action
We now correctly display the custom message as a message strip on the object page header upon initial navigation using the onAfterBinding controller extension
We now ensure that in page mode, the section title is hidden only for sections with a single control
